svcsubproc.title: Steering Wheel and Column
svcsubproc.para: When installing the steering wheel, attention should be given to index it properly on the shaft. Align the timing mark arrow on the shaft with the narrowest spoke (labeled "TOP") on the steering wheel.

svcsubproc.title: Pitman Arm Location
svcsubproc.para: The splined Pitman Arm must be aligned with the timing mark on the steering gear output shaft.

svcsubproc.title: Steering Column to Gear
svcsubproc.para:
Attach the steering column to the steering gear input shaft. Carefully align the lower U-joint pinch bolt and the whistle notch in the steering gear output shaft. Use a new shear-type pinch bolt in the yoke. Refer to the proper tightening procedure in the TORQUE CHART
.
